name: RollRover Free
description:
EightyEight Games presents RollRover, a fun and original game now on your iPod or iPhone.

"The gameplay is ever-changing and highly addictive" - 4/5 - touchreviews.net

"Excellent fun" - 4/5 - NineOverTen

You control the RollRover as you try to guide it to the goal with a unique control method

Features:

• 11 FREE Levels with puzzles that get progressively more fiendish
• Use powerups to change the size of your wheels
• Traverse over magnetic and glass blocks
• Find the star hidden on every level. Can you find them all?
• Master control of the rover in order to beat the target time
• Features the music of Neon Highwire

For info, support and feedback, check us out at http://www.eightyeightgames.com
